disambiguation if multiple)","puzzleSolution":"48-element ternary array solving the LWE puzzle"}},"commit(bytes32)":{"details":"Generate off-chain: keccak256(abi.encode(msg.sender, heirIndex, code, puzzleSolution))","params":{"commitHash":"Hash binding your address, heir index, secret code, and puzzle solution"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_heartbeatInterval":"How often owner must ping (in claiming"},"removeHeir(uint256)":{"params":{"heirIndex":"Index of the heir to remove"}}},"title":"TLOSDeadManSwitch - Inheritance Contract Protected by TLOS","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"addHeir(bytes32,uint16)":{"notice":"Add a new heir (only while owner is alive)"},"claim(uint256,bytes32,int8[48])":{"notice":"Claim inheritance share"},"commit(bytes32)":{"notice":"Commit to a claim attempt (prevents front-running)"},"constructor":{"notice":"Create a new dead man's switch"},"emergencyWithdraw(uint256)":{"notice":"Emergency withdrawal (only while owner is alive)"},"getPlantedSecret(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get the planted secret for off-chain solving (matches WeakLWEPuzzleV7)"},"getPuzzleSeed(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get the puzzle seed for a given heir code (for off-chain solving)"},"ping()":{"notice":"Ping to prove liveness - resets the dead man's switch timer"},"removeHeir(uint256)":{"notice":"Remove an heir (only while owner is alive)"}},"notice":"Dead man's switch / inheritance contract where heirs can claim after owner inactivity ============================================================================ WARNING: DEMONSTRATION ONLY - NOT AUDITED FOR PRODUCTION USE ============================================================================ For production deployments, use TLOSWithPuzzleV4.sol with full 4-layer security. This contract demonstrates the pattern with Layer 4 (planted LWE puzzle) only. ## Security Model (Section 4.1.2 - Wallet Recovery & Inheritance) Traditional inheritance contracts leak information:   - Heirs are publicly visible on-chain   - Distribution percentages are exposed   - Attackers can target known heirs with phishing/social engineering TLOS-protected inheritance hides:   - Heir secret codes inside the TLOS circuit   - Distribution structure (who gets what percentage)   - Number of heirs and their identities The planted LWE puzzle (3^48 ~ 2^76) prevents real-time brute-force attacks during claim attempts, while commit-reveal prevents mempool front-running. ## Flow Diagram (ASCII)   +----------------+                    +-------------------+   |     Owner      |                    |  Dead Man Switch  |   +----------------+                    +-------------------+          |                                       |          | ping() every heartbeatInterval        |          |-------------------------------------->|          |                                       | lastPing = now          |                                       |          |                                       |   [Owner stops pinging...]                       |          |                                       |          v                                       v   +----------------+    After timeout    +-------------------+   |    Timeout!    |-------------------->|  Claimable State  |   +----------------+                     +-------------------+          |                                       |          |                                       |   +----------------+                             |   |      Heir      |                             |   +----------------+                             |          |                                       |          | 1. commit(hash)                       |          |-------------------------------------->|          |                                       | store commitment          |                                       |          | [wait 2+ blocks]                      |          |                                       |          | 2. claim(code, puzzle, shareBPS)      |          |-------------------------------------->|          |                                       | verify commitment          |                                       | verify puzzle          |                                       | verify heir code          |                                       | verify share          |                                       |          |<--------------------------------------| transfer share          |         ETH (shareBPS / 10000)        |          |                                       |   +----------------+                     +-------------------+   | Heir Receives  |                     | Remaining Balance |   | Their Share    |                     | For Other Heirs   |   +----------------+                     +-------------------+ ## Heir Codes Hidden in Circuit Each heir has:   1. A secret code (bytes32) - known only to the heir   2. A share (basis points) - encoded as circuit output The codeHash = keccak256(code) is stored, but the actual heir codes and share distribution are computed inside the TLOS circuit, making them invisible to on-chain observers.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"examples/TLOSDeadManSwitch.sol":"TLOSDeadManSwitch"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":ds-test/=lib/solmate/lib/ds-test/src/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":solmate/=lib/solmate/src/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"examples/TLOSDeadManSwitch.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2fafcd7f1df5cbb4764b20854d52df7ee7cd41f9fb878d9bec4c656e8874d891","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7bd156b3810629d0e69016b62f096bd3e12172fbd5b1b1dd81647d7b9d57895e","dweb:/ipfs/QmUKt5EW7UtTN1G8cgAvwN1DQ3ZNm98soNcnqn66ierLb6"]}},"version":1}

claim(uint256,bytes32,int8[48]).details: Must wait COMMIT_DELAY blocks after committing

params.heirIndex: Which heir slot to claim (used for disambiguation if multiple)
params.puzzleSolution: 48-element ternary array solving the LWE puzzle

commit(bytes32).details: Generate off-chain: keccak256(abi.encode(msg.sender, heirIndex, code, puzzleSolution))

params.commitHash: Hash binding your address, heir index, secret code, and puzzle solution

params._heartbeatInterval: How often owner must ping (in seconds)
params._heirSharesBPS: Array of shares in basis points (must sum to <= 10000)

params.amount: Amount to withdraw (0 for full balance)

ping().details: Must be called at least once per heartbeatInterval to prevent heirs claiming

params.heirIndex: Index of the heir to remove

addHeir(bytes32,uint16).notice: Add a new heir (only while owner is alive)

commit(bytes32).notice: Commit to a claim attempt (prevents front-running)

constructor.notice: Create a new dead man's switch

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdrawal (only while owner is alive)

getPlantedSecret(bytes32).notice: Get the planted secret for off-chain solving (matches WeakLWEPuzzleV7)

getPuzzleSeed(bytes32).notice: Get the puzzle seed for a given heir code (for off-chain solving)

ping().notice: Ping to prove liveness - resets the dead man's switch timer

removeHeir(uint256).notice: Remove an heir (only while owner is alive)
